name: Demo Project Plan
description: Example plan demonstrating Agent Task Player features

tasks.name: Initialize project structure
tasks.prompt: Create a new Node.js project with TypeScript. Initialize package.json with name 'my-app', set up tsconfig.json with strict mode, and create src/ and tests/ directories.

tasks.name: Install dependencies
tasks.prompt: Install express, cors, and helmet as dependencies. Install @types/express, @types/cors, typescript, and jest as dev dependencies.

tasks.name: Create REST API
tasks.prompt: Create a REST API server in src/server.ts using Express. Add GET /health endpoint that returns { status: 'ok' }. Add GET /api/items endpoint that returns a hardcoded list of items. Use proper TypeScript types.

tasks.name: Add middleware
tasks.prompt: Add CORS and Helmet middleware to the Express server. Add request logging middleware that logs method, path, and response time.

tasks.name: Write unit tests
tasks.prompt: Write Jest unit tests for the /health and /api/items endpoints. Use supertest for HTTP testing. Ensure all tests pass.
